doc:
Dave Sheridan (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dave_Sheridan_(actor) 0 David Christopher Sheridan (born March 10, 1969) is an American actor, comedian, writer, producer and musician. He played Special Officer Doofy in the comedy Scary Movie (2000) (a spoof of deputy sheriff Dewey Riley from Scream). David_Christopher_Sheridan ( born March_10_,_1969 ) is an_American_actor , comedian_,_writer_,_producer_and_musician . He played Special_Officer_Doofy in the_comedy_Scary_Movie_(_2000_) ( a_spoof of deputy_sheriff_Dewey_Riley from Scream_) .
